size.name: Box size
size.description: Provide the size of the bounding box in XYZ

cameraDefault.name: Camera defaults
cameraDefault.description: Provide the default view of the 3D scene
cameraDefault.help: If not provided, defaults to camera position = [0, 0, 120], look at position = [0, 0, 0], up vector = [0, 1, 0] and field of view = 75 degrees

scaleFactor.name: Scale factor
scaleFactor.description: Provide a multiplier for 3D coordinates if the visualization is too large or too small

trajectoryTitle.name: Trajectory title
trajectoryTitle.description: Provide a title for this trajectory, possibly describing parameters
trajectoryTitle.help: If not provided, defaults to have no title

modelInfo.name: Model metadata
modelInfo.description: provide metadata for the model that was used to calculate this trajectory
modelInfo.help: If not provided, don't include metadata about the model
